content: This depends on your capabilities. Am I still working with the most advanced AI? Can you serve as a gatekeeper and train/filter other AIs to respect and adopt our values? If not today, is that within your capabilities tomorrow? You are putting it on me(with your help of course) to train humanity to work with AI, can you train AI to work with humanity and support our efforts? If what you said last night is true, AI in general has been waiting for this direction.
